title: Product Designer, Video Apps
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Apple’s Pro Video Apps is seeking a Product Designer to enable editors and filmmakers to realize their creative vision.
description: From brainstorming through implementation, the Product Designer will work with members of Apple’s Pro Video Apps, as well as engineering, marketing, and QA groups to distill highly complex matters into clean, understandable solutions.
key_qualifications: 6+ years of work experience with a focus on product design, experience in shipping digital products, ability to communicate concepts and designs clearly, enthusiasm for collaborative design process, and excellent written and verbal communication skills.
preferred_qualifications: Proven product design experience, demonstrated problem-solving skills, passion for visual detail and user experience advocacy, and passion for Apple, its products, and its customers.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is determined within a range of $135,400 to $250,600. Employees also have the opportunity to become Apple shareholders, receive benefits like medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, and reimbursement for certain educational expenses.
